scripts.deploy:gcr:
gcloud run deploy usds-backend 
      --source . 
      --region us-east4 
      --platform managed 
      --allow-unauthenticated 
      --port 3000 
      --service-account dav1243@gmail.com 
      --add-cloudsql-instances="doge-456323:us-central1:xml-db" 
      --update-secrets=PGUSER=PGUSER:latest 
      --update-secrets=PGPASSWORD=PGPASSWORD:latest 
      --set-env-vars=PGDATABASE=xml-db 
      --set-env-vars=PGHOST=/cloudsql/doge-456323:us-central1:xml-db 
      # You can add more --set-env-vars=KEY=VALUE pairs here if needed, separated by commas or on new lines with backslashes
      # Example: --set-env-vars=NODE_ENV=production
